member.name: D3D10_DEPTH_STENCILOP_DESC
member.summary: Describes the stencil operations that can be performed based on the results of stencil test.

member.name: D3D10_DEPTH_STENCILOP_DESC.StencilFailOp
member.summary: A member of the enumerated type that describes the stencil operation to perform when stencil testing fails. The default value is D3D10_STENCIL_OP_KEEP.

member.name: D3D10_DEPTH_STENCILOP_DESC.StencilDepthFailOp
member.summary: A member of the enumerated type that describes the stencil operation to perform when stencil testing passes and depth testing fails. The default value is D3D10_STENCIL_OP_KEEP.

member.name: D3D10_DEPTH_STENCILOP_DESC.StencilPassOp
member.summary: A member of the enumerated type that describes the stencil operation to perform when stencil testing and depth testing both pass. The default value is D3D10_STENCIL_OP_KEEP.

member.name: D3D10_DEPTH_STENCILOP_DESC.StencilFunc
member.summary: A member of the enumerated type that describes how stencil data is compared against existing stencil data. The default value is D3D10_COMPARISON_ALWAYS.
